article_title: Why Bashing Free Trade Is Paying Off for Trump and Sanders
article_text:

twitter.description: For a generation, free trade was a cornerstone issue of the Republican party, and of the center and right wings of the Democratic party. Now, it’s become an albatross around the neck of estab...
twitter.title: Why Bashing Free Trade Is Paying Off for Trump and Sanders

article_metadata.keywords: free trade, trade policy, bernie sanders, free trade agreement, nafta, donald trump, tpp, ted cruz, obama, health care, minimum wage

article_metadata.description: Both Trump and Sanders are bashing free trade. Here's why American voters in the Republican and Democratic parties are responding.
article_metadata.sailthru.title: Why Bashing Free Trade Is Paying Off for Trump and Sanders

article_metadata.sailthru.description: There's a reason why it's resonating on the left and the right.
